title: Subpart 1-2 - CORPORATIONS SUBJECT TO TAX
content:

§ 1-2.2 - Foreign corporations subject to tax. General
§ 1-2.3 - Foreign corporations - partnership interests
§ 1-2.4 - Foreign corporation - doing business
§ 1-2.5 - Foreign corporation - employing capital
§ 1-2.6 - Foreign corporation - owning or leasing property
§ 1-2.7 - Foreign corporation - maintaining an office
§ 1-2.8 - Foreign corporation - deriving receipts

§ 1-2.11 - Corporations not subject to tax

§ 1-2.14 to 1-2.17 - Repealed
§ 1-2.18 to 1-2.24 - Repealed
§ 1-2.25 - Repealed

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
